title: Bug 124598Copy the first table in attached file and paste it will paste a table with higher detail row.
description: Description:Copy the first table in attached file and paste it will paste a table with higer detail row.Steps to reproduce:1. Open attached file2. Copy the first table and paste itExpected result:The table pasted will be the same as its origin table.Actual result:The size of detail row changed in Layout.
